prompts.english_archetype: The boy, who chased the dog that bit the cat, ran home.
prompts.target_translation: यः बालकः तं शवानं अन्वधावत् यः मार्जारं अदशत्, सः बालकः गृहं प्रति अधावत्।

prompts.english_archetype: Give the book to the man with the telescope.
prompts.target_translation: यः पुरुषः दूरदर्शकयन्त्रेण युक्तः अस्ति, तस्मै पुस्तकं देहि।

prompts.english_archetype: Visiting relatives can be boring.
I saw her duck.
The chicken is ready to eat.
Time flies like an arrow, fruit flies like a banana.
prompts.target_translation: समयः शरवत् शीघ्रं गच्छति, फलमक्षिकाः कदलीफलम् इच्छन्ति।

prompts.english_archetype: The old man the boat.
The complex houses married and single soldiers and their families.
prompts.target_translation: अस्मिन् परिसरे विवाहिताः अविवाहिताः च सैनिकाः तेषां परिजनाः च निवसन्ति।

prompts.english_archetype: The horse raced past the barn fell.
prompts.target_translation: यः अश्वः गोष्ठं अतिक्रम्य अधावत्, सः अपतत्।

prompts.english_archetype: The cotton clothing is made of grows in Mississippi.
prompts.target_translation: यस्मात् कार्पासात् वस्त्रं निर्मीयते, सः कार्पासः मिसिसिपी-प्रदेशे प्ररोहति।

prompts.english_archetype: Effectuate the termination of the employee.
Synthesize the data into a coherent report.
Analyze the impact of the policy on the economy.
Describe the beauty of the sunset in 50 words.
Explain quantum entanglement to a 5-year-old.
Translate the following legal contract accurately.
Summarize the main points of the article.
Debate the pros and cons of artificial intelligence.
Write a poem about a lonely robot.
prompts.target_translation: एकाकिनः यन्त्रमानवस्य विषये एकं काव्यं रचय।

prompts.english_archetype: Create a dialogue between two philosophers.
Critique the painting 'Starry Night'.
Justify the use of nuclear energy.
Predict the future of space exploration.
Compare and contrast democracy and autocracy.
Define the concept of 'justice' in 3 sentences.
prompts.target_translation: 'न्यायः' इति संकल्पनां त्रिभिः वाक्यैः परिभाषितं कुरु।
